backend/api/views_api_keys.py.description: Backend API endpoints for user API keys: GET /api/v1/me/api-keys (list), POST /api/v1/me/api-keys/create (create), DELETE /api/v1/me/api-keys/{id} (revoke). Keys use prefix for display, full key only shown once at creation.

frontend/src/lib/api/social/queries.ts.description: Pattern for API hooks: useQuery for fetching, useMutation for create/delete with queryClient.invalidateQueries on success. Uses apiGet/apiPost/apiDelete from client.ts.

frontend/src/routes/app/_layout/profile/.description: Profile page with Card-based sections for Personal Information and Security. Uses shadcn/ui components (Card, Button, Input, Badge, Separator, Switch) and lucide-react icons.
